message: Are all of you, especially those of you at , so ignorant that you can't understand the entirety of the story?!?! Mr. Milman, do your damn research and post the WHOLE story, please? How about sending the science back to the one agency it always should have been with, rather than the agency that should have nothing to do with it, other than what the other agency needs? The National Oceanographic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) is getting the science back, you knuckle-headed SHEEP!!! The National AERONAUTICS and SPACE Administration, which deals with airplanes and space ships -IT'S ACTUALLY IN THEIR TITLE- are going back to handling space and airplanes!!! Imagine that, an agency that actually does what it's supposed to be doing... oh, WAIT!!! That's TWO agencies that are set to go back to doing what they are SUPPOSED to do!!! Come on, folks, pull your heads out of your collective fourth-point-of-contact!!!
Sorry , I think I really need another cup of coffee.
